channel.title: When Hitting Refresh Button On Dashboard I get the following error
channel.description:
Hi All
I seem to have an issue on one of my dashboards
Please check the image attached
So when i hit refresh i get the following error for some of my queries , please note these queries use the parameter on top , if i hit the small refresh icon on the widget it works fine
Has anyone seen this behaviour before ?
![image|689x246](upload://q2aSXqDucOPKJJMO7SVmXEIbT1j.png)

item.title: When Hitting Refresh Button On Dashboard I get the following error
item.dc:creator: moedawood
item.description:
Hi

Nothing in the inspector

We have redash version 8

It is installed on docker

Read full topic

item.title: When Hitting Refresh Button On Dashboard I get the following error
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Welcome to the Redash forum

I haven’t seen this before. Do you see anything suspicious in your browser’s network inspector? What version of Redash? How did you install?

Read full topic
